archived.description: Indicates whether the user account has been archived or not.

dateArchived.description: Date when the user account was archived.

active.description: Indicates whether the user is currently active or not.

accountOwner.description: Name of the account owner associated with the user.

rate.description: The hourly rate at which the user is compensated.

billableRate.description: The hourly rate at which the user's work is billed.

admin.description: Flag indicating if the user has administrative privileges.

isProjectManager.description: Flag indicating if the user is a project manager.

roleType.description: Type of role the user is assigned within the organization.
